actions.recommendation: PSA testing annually, starting from age 40 if one first-degree relative had prostate cancer before 65 or if there is a history of prostate cancer on either the mother or fatherâ€™s side. From age 50, every 2 years.
Go to bed at the same time, keep the bedroom cool, turn off screens 2 hours before bed, de-stress with guided meditation, take magnesium before bed.
